title: The Reincarnated Princess Candidate Aims for a Happy Ending - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   R-18   Reincarnated in Another World   Short Story   Yandere
author: Hasumi Eruka   蓮水えるか
description:
The noble daughter Esther spents her ordinary days as a candidate for the title of the Crown Princess, but one day she suddenly remembers her previous life.

And now she is the Heroine of the Novel “I fell into the Pit of Darkness – the Thorny Roses are captured”, that she used to read in her past life.

But Esther’s struggle begins now, as to avoid the tragedy, that will eventually come!>
